name: Cats Salvage
description:
Is there anything worse than a scared kitten on a tree that is afraid to go down?
Obviously yes: many kittens on the tree!
Help the team of firefighters to rescue all the kittens who throw themselves into the void and, rebound after rebound, bring them to your Fire Truck!
Will you succeed in this heroic endeavor?
Challenge your friends to beat your records in the "Easy" and "Hard" modes!
Relive the experience of the 80's Consoles in this exhilarating reinterpretation of a great Vintage Classic Game!
Fantastic depth effects, LCD effect and a 3D on the graphics for an even more realistic immersion.
Collect all the classics of "Back to the 80's - The Games"!
